content:
Hi,

Currently on the calendar it says that PSET 4 Checkoff is due the day after the PSET itself is due. Do we really only have one day to get our code checked off?
subject: PSET Checkoff 4

content: That is correct, but checkoffs for ps4 start on Oct 6 (the day after ps release). So you can get the checkoff as soon as you submit your final code. You may not resubmit code after getting the checkoff.
